name: Agatha Christie: And Then There Were None
name_original: Agatha Christie: And Then There Were None
description: Prepare yourself for an extraordinary investigative thriller in this superb adaptation of the world’s bestselling mystery novel. Play as the new eleventh character, Patrick Narracott, the boatman who takes the guests to Shipwreck Island. Mysteriously, you also end up trapped with the others. Command an exhilarating adventure as you solve the mystery and find the killer before you become the next victim.
